comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Ernest Ansermet (* November 11, 1883 in Vevey; † February 20, 1969 in Geneva) was a Swiss conductor. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Ansermet The photo was possibly taken in January 1916, when Ansermet arrived in New York on the French liner La Touraine, see The sun., January 07, 1916, Page 7, column 5.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: From 1915 to 1923 he was conductor for Diaghilev's Ballets Russes. Sergei Diaghilev:
